arts.ttl: European football: Pablo Barrios strikes late as Atlético keep leaders honest
arts.sum: Win over Sevilla closes gap to Real Madrid and Barcelona Gladbach’s teenage goalkeeper’s clean sheet streak ends Pablo Barrios scored deep in added time to give Atlético Madrid a much-needed 2-1 La Liga win at Sevilla on Sunday that ended their month-long six-game winless run in all competitions. Eliminated from the Champions League in the round of 16 on penalties by old rivals Real Madrid and knocked out of the Copa del Rey in the semi-finals by Barcelona, Atlético kept their slim hopes of claiming the league title alive after the leaders, Barça, and Real both dropped points on Saturday. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold replacement: Conor Bradley, Jeremie Frimpong assessed as Liverpool transfer rumours swirl
arts.sum: The likely exit of Trent Alexander-Arnold to Real Madrid has led to speculation that Liverpool could look to sign Bayer Leverkusen wing-back Jeremie Frimpong.

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Brest: Mika Biereth and Breel Embolo to continue up front
